website_summaries.verdict: Its fabric covered exterior will catch your eye, but this slim portable charger’s versatility and power capacity are this model’s biggest selling points.
pros: May fully charge your smartphone up to 3 times on a full battery
cons: Its wireless charging feature is noticeably slower than a direct USB connection

customer_reviews.title: Not for use on airplane!
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed upon opening the Amazon box was the warning: do NOT use on airplane which was the entire reason I purchased this item. Better product info is needed so buyers are aware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Magatagan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great
customer_reviews.text: I love the fabric look, and so far this power bank hasn't let down. You can charge the bank while charging a device wirelessly too!. Of particular note, works with a phone case on, so it's a strong charger.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Forhan

customer_reviews.title: Great battery.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Holds power very well- I was able to use it over the course of a week+ to make sure various hand held devices had battery power.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Kazaras

customer_reviews.title: Cosmetically appealing, not best performance
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, doesn’t seem to hold a charge very long unfortunately. But great color and concept.
customer_reviews.author: jshef1992

customer_reviews.title: Battery dies super fast, no significant charging speed
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a fathers day gift ... the battery dies super fast. Bad device altogether
customer_reviews.author: James J Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Always ready to charge for ya
customer_reviews.text: Easy to charge then use. USB-C cable is clutch and I even use my Mac Power Charger to give it juice. Perfect for Disneyland and trips with limited access to plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Rueda

customer_reviews.title: The power bank I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: For a person who used Anker for power banks for a while now, their new ones that I want are really expensive now. This iOttie iON power bank checks all of my boxes. 18W USB-C and USB-A, 36 W total output, 5W wireless charging, portable size, you name it. And I really like the fabric finish. Really good power bank that is very comparable to Anker's products. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Le

customer_reviews.title: Saves the day
customer_reviews.text: The iOttie iON Wireless Go Power Bank 10000mAH works well (as long as you remember to charge it) and successfully recharged a iPhone from 10% to 80% in around an hour and a half on the tennis court, no plug access required. It was a gift to a friend a couple of weeks ago, and I have been thanked several times so far. Very useful, I'm told. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Olson

customer_reviews.title: Useful compact charger
customer_reviews.text: Compact and powerful. Quite a useful charger, with or without the cable. I really like the digital readout for remaining power percentage. Charges my phone quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Roz17

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay on for long, so you constantly have to turn it back on to continue charging your device.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne S.

product_meta.title: iOttie iON Wireless Go Power Bank Portable Charger | Qi Wireless Charging 10000mAH || Ruby
feature_bullets: CHARGE ALL DAY : 10,000 mAh power bank provides up to 3 charges (this will vary based off of your smartphone/ tablet's battery size)
TRULY WIRELESS : Qi Wireless charge on the go with 5W Standard Qi Wireless Charging, no wires necessary (wireless charging not quick charge speed)
CHARGE MULTIPLE DEVICES AT ONCE : Includes a fast charging 18W Qualcomm 3.0 USB A out & 18W PD bidirectional USB C
EASY READ : Numeric LED light clearly shows remaining battery life
LUXURY FEEL : Soft heathered fabric wrapped design makes it a stylish accessory

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars23 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
